name: Virtual Access Key

name: Heir to Carcosa
text: Revelation - Add Heir to Carcosa to your deck. Permanent. [reaction] When earning experience during the resolution of a scenario: The investigator with the least mental trauma (choose one if there are more than one) earns 1 additional experience for each mental trauma that investigator has.

name: Desync
text: Revelation - You must either (choose one): - Suffer 1 mental trauma and add 1 tally mark next to your "Memories". Then, exile this card. - If your deck has 5 or more cards in it, shuffle this card back into your deck. Otherwise, discard it.
